<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for (Iterator<Map<String, String>> iter = allFieldValues.iterator(); iter.hasNext(); ){
int row = iter.next().get("rowNumber");
int column = iter.next().get("columnNumber");
// Do something with row and column
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can get the value of the "rowNumber" and "columnNumber" columns from the first map in the iteration and use them to access the next map in the iteration. This way, you can iterate through the maps and access the values of the specific columns.
